channel.title: Custom Item Glitch

item.title: Custom Item Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Nathan8888 Nathan8888
item.description:
@Nathan8888 wrote:

Ok so i added like 5 customs and they all appear on my head Summon help please

if(i == 14484) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 44590; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 43660; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 43600; itemDef.modelZoom = 789; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 240; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 60; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -23; itemDef.name = "Dragon claws"; itemDef.description = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes(); } if(i == 13742) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 40915; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 40942; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 40942; itemDef.modelZoom = 1616; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 396; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1050; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -3; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 4; itemDef.name = "Elysian Spirit Shield"; itemDef.description = "It's a Elysian spirit shield.".getBytes(); } if(i == 13740) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 40921; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 40939; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 40939; itemDef.modelZoom = 1616; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 396; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1050; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -3; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 4; itemDef.name = "Divine Spirit Shield"; itemDef.description = "It's a Divine spirit shield.".getBytes(); } if(i == 13744) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 40920; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 40940; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 40940; itemDef.modelZoom = 1616; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 396; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1050; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -3; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 4; itemDef.name = "Spectral spirit shield"; itemDef.description = "It's a Spectral spirit shield.".getBytes(); } if(i == 14004) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.modelID = 42593; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 42624; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 42624; itemDef.modelZoom = 1440; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 545; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 2; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 5; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 4; itemDef.name = "Vesta's Chainbody"; itemDef.description = "An ancient chainbody once worn by Vesta.".getBytes(); } if(i == 14005) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.modelID = 42581; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 42633; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 42647; itemDef.modelZoom = 1753; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 562; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 11; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3; itemDef.name = "Vesta's Chainbody"; itemDef.description = "An ancient chainbody once worn by Vesta.".getBytes(); } if(i == 14006) { itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID = 42597; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 42615; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 42615; itemDef.modelZoom = 1744; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 738; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1985; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0; itemDef.name = "Vesta's Longsword"; itemDef.description = "An ancient longsword once worn by Vesta.".getBytes(); }
